definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

sentences.english: Then adaptive NNs (Neural Networks) are introduced for their structure and approximation ability.
sentences.chinese: 接着对自适应神经网络及其逼近特性加以介绍。

sentences.english: A novel algorithm is proposed for training complex-valued neural networks.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新型复数前馈神经网络的学习算法。

sentences.english: Neural networks (NNs) have become one of ideal tools in modeling nonlinear relationship between inputs and desired outputs.
sentences.chinese: 神经网络模型能有效地模拟非线性的输入输出关系。

sentences.english: The predicted soil water content fairly well agrees with the observ…
sentences.chinese: 用神经网络建立土壤水分预测模型的方法是可行的。

sentences.english: The key feature of AANN is feature extract and noise filtering.
sentences.chinese: 自联想神经网络关键在于特征提取和噪声滤波。

sentences.english: This paper designs a internal model control system with radial basis function neural networks.
sentences.chinese: 文章用径向基神经网络设计内模控制系统。

sentences.english: The article puts forward a complex system for fuzzy model-building and a method for a control nerve network .
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种复杂系统模糊建模及控制的神经网络方法。

sentences.english: The application of neural network theory in engineering geology.
sentences.chinese: 神经网络理论在工程地质中的应用。

sentences.english: The brain works on neural networks.
sentences.chinese: 大脑依靠神经网络工作。

sentences.english: The recurrent neural network model based on projective operator is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一种基于投影算子的神经网络模型。

sentences.english: The thermodynamical properties of polymers are studied using a BP artificial neural network model.
sentences.chinese: 用前馈多层神经网络方法研究了高聚物的热力学性质。

sentences.english: The MSNN model consisted of five parallel multi-layer feed-forward neural networks (MLNN).
sentences.chinese: 模型采用5个并行工作的多层前向神经网络。

sentences.english: Then, combining IMD-Isomap and generalized regression neural network, which has a good ability for approximation, a classifier is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 然后，结合泛化回归神经网络，设计出一种分类器。

sentences.english: In this paper, the global exponential stability of discrete-time neural networks is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了离散时间神经网络的全局指数稳定性问题。

sentences.english: There is a natural relationship between case-based reasoning and neural network.
sentences.chinese: 范例推理与神经网络有一种自然的联系。

sentences.english: The method of building soil water forecast model with neural network is available.
sentences.chinese: 用神经网络建立土壤水分预测模型的方法是可行的。

definition: Bayes (name)/Thomas Bayes (1702-1761), English mathematician and theologian

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
